mapper.sql: ID, OddsID, UpOdds, Goal, DownOdds, ModifyTime, isEarly
mapper.select: select l.oddsid,d.* from totalScorehalf l LEFT JOIN totalScorehalfDetail d on d.OddsID = l.OddsID where l.ScheduleID = #{mid} and l.CompanyID = #{cpy} order by ModifyTime desc limit 1
select t.OddsID as from totalscorehalf t left join totalscorehalfdetail d on t.OddsID = d.OddsID where t.ScheduleID = #{mid} and t.CompanyID = #{cpy} order by d.ModifyTime desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into totalscorehalfdetail (ID, OddsID, UpOdds, Goal, DownOdds, ModifyTime, isEarly) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL}, #{goal,jdbcType=REAL}, #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isearly,jdbcType=BIT})

insert into totalscorehalfdetail
ID,
OddsID,
UpOdds,
Goal,
DownOdds,
ModifyTime,
isEarly,

mapper.update:
update totalscorehalfdetail
OddsID = #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UpOdds = #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL},
Goal = #{goal,jdbcType=REAL},
DownOdds = #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL},
ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isEarly = #{isearly,jdbcType=BIT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update totalscorehalfdetail set OddsID = #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UpOdds = #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL}, Goal = #{goal,jdbcType=REAL}, DownOdds = #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL}, ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isEarly = #{isearly,jdbcType=BIT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
